attributes.additional_details: Abolish the BBC television license. The BBC have been silent on the matter of climate (change demonstrations outside their headquarters) . The BBC were silent and complicit regarding Jimmy Saville and other BBC paedophiles and their proclivities. The BBC are bias with their news coverage, being economical with the truth and misleading in their coverage of news generally
attributes.background: Abolish the BBC television license. The BBC have been silent on the matter of climate change. Economical with the truth and misleading in their coverage of news generally
